hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the way of the hero.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #a Shadow Temple Small Key# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found on #the Death Mountain Trail#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that ##Kokiri Forest## has #1# major item.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Game Key# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: When ASM is used to code a randomizer they should call it ASMR.

GC (Maze).text: They say that a spider high #above the icy waters# holds #a Map of the Ice Cavern#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Ganon's Castle Small Key# and #the Song of Storms#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the way of the hero.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides a #Great Fairy Fountain#.

HC (Malon).text: Have you embraced the power of the Deku Nut yet?

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the path to #the Key#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #at the Desert Colossus#, skulltulas at night hold...^ #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)# and #the Zora Mask#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that in the #central rooms of the well# spiders hold...^ #a Deku Tree Compass# and #Arrows (30 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well GS West Inner Room
Bottom of the Well GS East Inner Room

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Spirit Temple Small Key#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Kokiri Sword# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that a room containing a #large pot in the Shadow Temple# holds...^ #the Goron Mask# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple GS Single Giant Pot

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides a #stable#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers #Impa's House#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Prelude of Light#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs #Talon's House#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that the #northern basement of the Water Temple# contains...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Water Temple GS Near Boss Key Chest

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that plundering #inside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the path to the #Kokiri Emerald#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern GS Vines Above Stairs

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that the song written in the #royal tomb# is #the Requiem of Spirit#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that a #spider behind a muddy wall# in a grotto holds #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that ##Dodongo's Cavern## has #4# major items.

ToT (Left).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Prelude of Light#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that ##the Spirit Temple## has #5# major items.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #the Song of Time# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #the Sun's Song# can be found at #the Sacred Forest Meadow#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: I hear Termina is a great spot for a vacation!

ZR (Near Grottos).text: Master, there is a 0 percent chance that this hint is useful in any way.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Water Temple# is on the path to #the Tower#.
